thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Guangzhou Wondfo Biotech sees 2017 net profit up 30 pct to 55 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangzhou Wondfo Biotech sees 2017 net profit up 30 pct to 55 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - guangzhou wondfo biotech co ltd

text:
Jan 17(Reuters) - Guangzhou Wondfo Biotech Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to be increase by 30 percent to 55 percent, or to be 188.5 million yuan to 224.7 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 145 million yuan
* Says that increased operation revenue, enhancement of profitability, and increased management expenses and sales expenses as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/gaRV1r
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
